LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.label: Flameblaster
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.description:
A flame launcher used by mechs that can and will ignite flammable materials within its range.
This weapon is designed specifically for mounted use, so only specific units can equip it.
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord_Vehicle.label: Kord
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord_Vehicle.description:
Kord anti-everything machinegun chambered in death.
This weapon is designed specifically for mounted use, so only specific units can equip it.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord_Vehicle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek_B.label: 2B9A Vasilek
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek_B.description: An ancient design for rapid fire indirect artillery fire. The Vasilek can fire four mortar rounds in one burst.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek_B.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: 2B9A Vasilek
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGunMounted.label: Mounted HMG
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGunMounted.description:
A heavy machine gun for mech soldiers or infantry support platforms.
This weapon is designed specifically for mounted use, so only specific units can equip it.
LanguageData.DMS_LightMachineGunMounted.label: Mounted LMG
LanguageData.DMS_LightMachineGunMounted.description:
A Supressive weapon chambered in a standard rifle round.
This weapon is designed specifically for mounted use, so only specific units can equip it.
LanguageData.DMS_ShotgunGunMounted.label: Close Inbound Defense System
LanguageData.DMS_ShotgunGunMounted.description:
A multi-barrel shotgun designed to suppress enemies at close-range.
This weapon is designed specifically for mounted use, so only specific units can equip it.
LanguageData.DMS_SubMachineGunMounted.label: Mounted SMG
LanguageData.DMS_SubMachineGunMounted.description:
A Supressive weapon chambered in pistol rounds.
This weapon is designed specifically for mounted use, so only specific units can equip it.
